citations.narrative:
The interior ceiling of the bird trailer housing the budgies needs to be addressed. The budgies have been pecking and
peeling off the cardboard material of the ceiling creating gaps between the metal roof and interior ceiling. This ceiling
needs to be fixed to prevent the birds from having access to the metal roof and to keep the trailer in good repair for the
safety of the budgies.
Correct by: May 25, 2024

The current records of animals on hand do not accurately reflect the animals at the facility. The records do not disclose
the date of death for the porcupine, kangaroo and budgies that recently passed away. Nor is there a record for the date of
the porcupine and kangaroo births at the facility. These records need to be maintained in an accurate and timely manner
to promote good recordkeeping practices.
Correct by: March 10, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.150(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The interior ceiling of the bird trailer housing the budgies needs to be addressed. The budgies have been pecking and 
peeling off the cardboard material of the ceiling creating gaps between the metal roof and interior ceiling. This ceiling 
needs to be fixed to prevent the birds from having access to the metal roof and to keep the trailer in good repair for the 
safety of the budgies. 
Correct by: May 25, 2024 
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The current records of animals on hand do not accurately reflect the animals at the facility. The records do not disclose 
the date of death for the porcupine, kangaroo and budgies that recently passed away. Nor is there a record for the date of 
the porcupine and kangaroo births at the facility. These records need to be maintained in an accurate and timely manner 
to promote good recordkeeping practices.  
Correct by: March 10, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
